Parameter.Name: LogPath
Parameter.Comment: If no log file path specified, this value should be used.

Parameter.Name: LogFile
Parameter.Comment: If no log file specified, this value should be used.

Parameter.Name: CredSSPUser
Parameter.Comment: User name used in CredSSP authentication. Should be a memeber of RDP User Group on Drive Computer.

Parameter.Name: tcComputerName
Parameter.Comment: The machine name or ip address of terminal client.

Parameter.Name: driverComputerName
Parameter.Comment: The machine name or ip address of driver computer.

Parameter.Name: RDPListeningPort
Parameter.Comment: The listening port of driver computer.

Parameter.Name: ipVersion
Parameter.Comment: The ip version used in test enviornment, can be IPv4 or IPv6.

Parameter.Name: securityProtocol
Parameter.Comment: The security protocol used to establish RDP connection, can be TLS, CredSSP, or RDP.

Parameter.Name: negotiationBasedApproach
Parameter.Comment: Whether the connection sequence is Negotiation-Based Approach or Direct Approach.

Parameter.Name: osVersion
Parameter.Comment: The operating system of terminal client.It can be set to Windows or NonWindows.

Parameter.Name: RDPVersion
Parameter.Comment: The version of the RDP intends to test, it should be one of 7.0, 7.1, 8.0, 8.1.

Parameter.Name: workgroupDomain
Parameter.Comment: Indicates the test environment is in Domain or Workgroup.

Parameter.Name: tcSystemDrive
Parameter.Comment: The system drive of terminal client. A example is C.

Parameter.Name: compressionInTC
Parameter.Comment: Whether compression is used in terminal client
